title: Dessert island ice cream getaway
description: Remember ‘dessert island’ not desert island… you’ll need a fully equipped kitchen for this one! But boy is it worth it for this dramatic dessert.Equipment and preparation: you will need an electric ice cream maker, food processor or blender, a hand-held stick blender, an electric hand mixer, 33x23cm/13x9in Swiss roll tin, a piping bag and a zip lock bag.
ingredients: ½ small pineapple, peeled and flesh grated (about 225g/8oz grated pineapple), juice reserved
